entry.title: Cult of the Lamb Update Revamps Enemies And Makes Combat More Challenging
entry.content:
Devolver Digital has revealed new details about Cult of the Lamb's upcoming free update called Relics of the Old Faith. Final touches are being worked on and a release date is going to be announced soon.
In the new update, there will be new enemies and bosses added to the post-game. Additionally, many new combat mechanics have been added in order to give the game's combat more depth and challenge. As such, each boss has been revamped with new attack patterns. There are also four new structures that players can build at their base, including a kitchen, crypt, shared shelter, and organized farm.
NEW POST-GAME SNEAK PREVIEW📔 Brand New Post-Game Storyline🦑 Revamped Enemies and Bosses🗡️ Remixed Dungeons and EncountersRelics of the Old Faith is our FREE Major Content Update! We're working on the final touches and will share a release date soon. See more in 🧵 below pic.twitter.com/mIR34Eoocw
Cult of the Lamb has received some updates, such as the limited-time Blood Moon Festival Halloween event back in October. Fans of the game can preorder a Youtooz figure of the main character and they are expected to ship in July. The game was also nominated for Best Game, Best Game Design, and Best Original Property on the 2023 BAFTA Games Awards list.
In GameSpot's Cult of the Lamb review, we said, "Cult of the Lamb merges the best parts of a roguelike with all the charms of a real-time simulation game in a delightfully macabre ceremony you don't want to miss."


【詳細句子文法解析】

1. Devolver Digital has revealed new details about Cult of the Lamb's upcoming free update called Relics of the Old Faith.
-句子中使用了現在完成式(the present perfect tense)，用於強調這個動作已經完成，同時強調之前和現在的時間之間有所連繫。

2. Final touches are being worked on and a release date is going to be announced soon.
-此句中使用進行時(the present progressive tense)，用於描述現在正在進行的動作，現階段正在進行最後的修改。

3. In the new update, there will be new enemies and bosses added to the post-game.
-這是一個複合句，其中主句是there will be new enemies and bosses；子句中使用了被動式(the passive voice)，因為這個動作是以新的update為主要語義，而新的update才是這個動作的執行者。

4. Additionally, many new combat mechanics have been added in order to give the game's combat more depth and challenge.
-此句中使用了連詞(additionally)來增加補充性訊息，再使用了分詞片語(Added in order to)來描述給游戲戰鬥增加的動作。

5. each boss has been revamped with new attack patterns.
-主語是boss，動詞是revamped，強調每個boss都經歷了全面升級。

6. Cult of the Lamb has received some updates, such as the limited-time Blood Moon Festival Halloween event back in October.
-此句中使用了現在完成式，強調這個動作或事件已經完成，同時有一個清晰的時間連繫(back in October)。

7. Fans of the game can preorder a Youtooz figure of the main character and they are expected to ship in July.
-此句使用了can來表達能力和權利，同時使用了被動式來強調Youtooz人物的出現，而动词被忽略了。

8. The game was also nominated for Best Game, Best Game Design, and Best Original Property on the 2023 BAFTA Games Awards list.
-過去式慣用於過去已經完成事情的描述，游戲被提名是一個過去已經完成的事情。

9. In GameSpot's Cult of the Lamb review, we said, "Cult of the Lamb merges the best parts of a roguelike with all the charms of a real-time simulation game in a delightfully macabre ceremony you don't want to miss."
- 此句為複合句，其中主句為We said，在引號中為一個句子，由合併(commonly called blending)語義合併roguelike和simulation game而成。

10. Relics of the Old Faith is our FREE Major Content Update!
-敘述這是一個主要的免費更新，並且是Devolver Digital所提供的文本。由总编发声。

【單字】
1. revamp - 進行全面改良
-片語◎rewamp是相對應的片語

2. mechanics - 机把掣，机器的运动
-外来语：もかみ、マシン

3. announcement - 宣告，宣布，報導
-類似片語◎declaration, pronouncement, forthtell

4. encounter - 遇到，啸水对阵嘬
-類似片語◎meet, come across, clash

5. post-game - 遊戲後續
-唯一解：遊玩後

6. depth - 深度
-相似词◎deepness, profoundness; 反义词〇superficiality

7. limited-time - 有限時間
-類似片語◎time limited, time-constrained

8. nomination - 提名
-相似片語◎appointment, initiation；反义片语〇disqualification

9. charm - 魅力
-相似词◎appeal, attraction； 反义词〇unglamorous

10. macabre - 骇人的，可怕的
-反义词〇pleasant，相似片语◎grim, gruesome

【片語】
1. new details - 新資訊
-相似片語◎latest news, further disclosure；反义词〇old facts

2. final touches - 最后的修订
-相似片语◎finishing touches, last touches；反义词〇beginning touch

3. in order to - 以便
-同义词〇so as to, for the purpose of；反义词〇deviating from

4. at their base - 在基地
-相似片语◎in their location, on their spot；反义词〇abroad, exterior area

5. sneak preview - 試映
-相似片语◎trailer, preview show；反义词〇full-length version

6. limited-time - 限定時間
-相似片语◎time-bound, on-the-clock; 反义词〇all-day-long

7. Best Original Property - 最佳原创财产
-反义词〇Worst Reproduced Property（最糟复制成果），相似词◎Best adapted work

8. real-time simulation - 实时模拟
-相似词◎live imitation, instant mimicking, 反义词〇slow-motion verification
